title: Hidden in Plain Sight: Best Practices for Subscription Customer Retention
summary: This page features a fireside chat between Robbie Kellman Baxter and Darryl Hicks discussing the critical link between existing customers and revenue growth. It highlights the impact of negative brand experiences on churn and the financial value of recovered customers.
key_points: Best practices for subscription customer retention.
The connection between existing customers and revenue growth.
Financial value of recovered customers vs. single transactions.
Importance of invisible recovery for failed payments.
